text: Vladimir Lanyugin (born 21 December 1948) is a Russian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male equestrians Category:Soviet male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the Soviet Union Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Khabarovsk
title: Vladimir Lanyugin
